channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Will the Fed ‘weaponize’ the bond market to ‘teach Trump a lesson’?
Hypertension is a ‘silent killer.’ Here’s what your blood pressure should be at every age
item.description: Over time, hypertension can lead to serious medical problems including stroke, heart attack, and kidney failure.

item.title: This CEO fired 90% of his staff for missing a morning meeting. He stands by the choice
item.description: ‘Firing those individuals was the right move for our organization, and we are stronger than ever,’ the CEO later wrote on LinkedIn.

item.title: Special counsel Jack Smith asks judge to dismiss Trump criminal case
Tether was an outlaw for years. Now the $132 billion stablecoin has a key ally in Trump’s Cabinet
item.description: The controversial Tether is reportedly facing a probe from both the Justice and Treasury departments.

item.title: Billionaires Bill Ackman, Marc Andreessen, and Travis Kalanick are reportedly getting involved in DOGE
item.description: Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy are looking to Silicon Valley leaders for an unofficial government entity, according to the Washington Post.

item.title: Three reasons the No. 2 cryptocurrency could be poised to follow bitcoin’s lead
This market-timing model dubs stocks a ‘dead cold sell.’ It’s been right before.
Dangerous ultra-processed foods are linked to more than 30 health conditions. Here’s how to identify and avoid them
item.description: Processing isn't inherently negative—the extent of processing and its impact on nutrient density are critical factors to consider.

item.title: Just 1 of 30 components is in the red as the Dow surges 450 points. It’s Nvidia.
